documents.document: Only just heard about the shitstorm that went down at last night's @HashtagLowBlows' event. Hope everyone is okay, totally crazy.
Someone remind me why I still watch this crap? Really deflated after that. #30 #RoyalRumble
Congrats Cena. That was spectacular. #royalrumble
Ooooh I forgot about the Cruiserweight match. Make that 3 matches I wanna see! #RoyalRumble
"I wish Charly was here, she's better than you." -Chris Jericho to Charly Caruso. #RoyalRumble
This is JeriKO's best segment yet. "A sexy nebula.. a very sexy nebula". #RoyalRumble
@KentoCCFC It would appear so
A girl I know from Paddy Power just told me someone JUST placed a â‚¬1000 bet on the Rumble. That's one confident customer. #RoyalRumble
How is Undertaker gonna walk down that massive ramp in less than 90 seconds? #RoyalRumble #JustPhenomThings
There's only like 2 matches I wanna see tonight, but whatever, should be fun. #RoyalRumble, let's have ya.
Who is your dream Wrestlemania opponent? #AskAmbrose
RIP Geoff Nicholls.
One of my Reddit comments received Reddit gold this morning. I feel so validated by 1000s of strangers. It's a weirdly nice feeling.
My latest review is ALIVE. Always a great time with these guys, made better with an appearance by @craiggallagher2.â€¦ https://t.co/eCfBbYeheL
In Rathmines. Does anybody actually live here or does everyone just drive through it?
Black Mirror has made me afraid to tweet anything. Expect radio silence from me for a while.
As a heterosexual male, I can't get over how in love I just fell with Ryan Gosling's character in La La Land. No shame. #LALALAND
Very few things sound better than Airbourne cranked up to 11.
With Dean's blessing, my Sunday kicks into lazy overdrive. https://t.co/sBZEEVZbJq
Gave up trying to fix tech issues. Here's my review of @TeeLeee awesome new track. Read this, share it, then listenâ€¦ https://t.co/DlRQNmLf7t
Trying to sort out a tech problem, and then will launch a new article. Sorry for flooding timelines, the posts have been removed!
If you're following your timeline religiously today you'll have noticed I've been posting links to the same article over and over.
Gonna drop a review of @TeeLeee's new single, "If I Burn (You Burn Too)" at around midday tomorrow. All eyes on @FortitudeMag, great song.
Seeing Domhnall Gleeson in an episode of #BlackMirror has been the highlight of my day so far. #BeRightBack

Taking the day off from responsibilities to enjoy it. Leave me alone. #JustGamerThings

I spelt Nickelback wrong for the first time ever. See also: Iron Maiden's Running Free vs. all of Final Frontier.
Or even Nickleback's The State album vs. No Fixed Address.
Why is it that the more produced a song is, specifically in the rock genre, the less I'm likely to enjoy it? See: Whiplash vs. Hardwired
